item.title: Erica add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Erica add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Erica add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Erica add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Erica add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Erica add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Erica add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Erica add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Erica add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Erica add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Erica add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Erica add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Erica add a quote by Johnny Depp
item.description: "We're all damaged in our own way. Nobody's perfect. I think we're all somewhat screwy. Every single one of us." -- Johnny Depp

item.title: Erica add a quote by Lucille Ball
item.description: "Once in his life, every man is entitled to fall madly in love with a gorgeous redhead." -- Lucille Ball

item.title: Erica add a quote by William S. Burroughs
item.description: "There are no innocent bystanders ... what are they doing there in the first place?" -- William S. Burroughs

item.title: Erica add a quote by Charles de Lint
item.description: "Every time we fix something that broken, whether it's a car engine or a broken heart, that an act of magic. And what makes it magic is that we choose to create or help, just as we can choose to harm." -- Charles de Lint

item.title: Erica add a quote by Marlene Dietrich
item.description: "It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter." -- Marlene Dietrich

item.title: Erica add a quote by Henri Nouwen
item.description: "When we honestly ask ourselves which person in our lives mean the most to us, we often find that it is those who, instead of giving advice, solutions, or cures, have chosen rather to share our pain and touch our wounds with a warm and tender hand. The friend who can be silent with us in a moment of despair or confusion, who can stay with us in an hour of grief and bereavement, who can tolerate not knowing, not curing, not healing and face with us the reality of our powerlessness, that is a friend who cares." -- Henri Nouwen

item.title: Erica add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Erica add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Erica add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Erica add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Erica add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "I am always saying "Glad to've met you" to somebody I'm not at all glad I met. If you want to stay alive, you have to say that stuff, though." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Erica add a quote by Ally Condie
item.description: "Growing apart doesn't change the fact that for a long time we grew side by side; our roots will always be tangled. I'm glad for that." -- Ally Condie

item.title: Erica add a quote by Emilie Autumn
item.description: "It gives me strength to have somebody to fight for; I can never fight for myself, but, for others, I can kill." -- Emilie Autumn

item.title: Erica add a quote by Stephen Schwartz
item.description: "I've heard it said that people come into our lives for a reason Bringing something we must learn And we are led to those who help us most to grow If we let them and we help them in return." -- Stephen Schwartz

item.title: Erica add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "I want to grow a flower for every time someone tells me “F*** you.” Then I’ll go back to that person and pin the flower on their lapel in a gesture of friendship. And while they are looking down on it in astonishment, I’ll bunch up my knuckles and punch them in the face." -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Erica add a quote by Bernard Meltzer
item.description: "A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked." -- Bernard Meltzer

item.title: Erica add a quote by Winston Groom
item.description: "Stupid is as stupid looks." -- Winston Groom

item.title: Erica add a quote by Ally Condie
item.description: "Every minute you spend with someone gives them a part of your life and takes part of theirs." -- Ally Condie
